column5: Hey Ryan.  Who caught this fish and did you photoshop Dave's head on?
It's one of those funky lenses I think.  Back lake Bassin.  Can't beat it.
Ryan is gone north for the weekend and Dave posted that on FB and from reading the comments the pic is reel,prolly just a effect of the lense or camera angle
It's called the "make fish big" lens
guys, I was just kidding as the pic looked funny, that's all.
I figured as much I was just clearing the air because people on facebook were calling it a fake because it looks wierd .but Dave does sorta look like his bobble head in that pic
